title: For rent 1712sqrft 4 bedroom 2.5 bath house.
posting_body: Just remodeled, new lighting, paint, flooring, carpet, new heat / ac.
Lots of storage in the garage, cabinets on all sides.
Plenty of room for one car / truck and perhaps a motorcycle or a few bicycles.. or whatever you travel around on :-)
Two parking spaces outside in the driveway.
This property has a balcony on the front, and a nice pourch on the back.
Do you like out doors activities?
You will be just near several parks for dog walking, or hiking around the castro valley lake!
Also, Castro valley plaza is a 5 minute drive away for easy access to groceries, entertainment, and my favorite... Coffee shops!
The neighbors here are very friendly and quiet.
The neighborhood is safe for walking around, and talking to people as you go, or just walking if you prefer :-).
You don't actually have to drive to get to SF, or anywhere BART accessible!
This property is bikeable to bart, or walkable to both local and trans bay AV transit.
